00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TESTHARNESS_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_TESTHARNESS_H

00025 #include <log4cpp/FileAppender.hh>
00026 #include <log4cpp/Layout.hh>

00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include <string>

00032 extern "C" {
00033 #include <errno.h>
00034 }
00035 
00036 #include "Logger.h"
00037 
00038 
00039 namespace Hypertable {
00040 
00041   class TestHarness {
00042   public:
00043     TestHarness(const char *name) : m_name(name), m_error(0) {
00044       Logger::initialize(name);
00045 
00046       // open temporary output file
00047       sprintf(m_output_file, "%s%d", name, getpid());
00048 
00049       if ((m_fd = open(m_output_file, O_CREAT | O_TRUNC | O_WRONLY, 0644))
00050           < 0) {
00051         HT_ERRORF("open(%s) failed - %s", m_output_file, strerror(errno));
00052         exit(1);
00053       }
00054 
00055       Logger::set_test_mode(name, m_fd);
00056     }
00057     ~TestHarness() {
00058       if (!m_error)
00059         unlink(m_output_file);
00060     }
00061 
00062     int get_log_file_descriptor() { return m_fd; }
00063 
00064     void validate_and_exit(const char *golden_file) {
00065       validate(golden_file);
00066       _exit(m_error);
00067     }
00068     
00069     int validate(const char *golden_file) {
00070       close(m_fd);
00071       String command = (String)"diff " + m_output_file + " " + golden_file;
00072       m_error = system(command.c_str());
00073 
00074       if (m_error)
00075         std::cerr << "Command: "<< command << "exited with "<< m_error
00076                   << ", see '" << m_output_file << "'" << std::endl;
00077 
00078       return m_error;
00079     }
00080 
00081     void regenerate_golden_file(const char *golden_file) {
00082       String command = (String)"mv " + m_output_file + " " + golden_file;
00083       HT_ASSERT(system(command.c_str()) == 0);
00084     }
00085 
00086     void clear_output() {
00087       if (!m_appender->reopen()) {
00088         HT_ERRORF("Problem re-opening logging output file %s", m_output_file);
00089         display_error_and_exit();
00090       }
00091     }
00092 
00093     void display_error_and_exit() {
00094       close(m_fd);
00095       std::cerr << "Error, see '" << m_output_file << "'" << std::endl;
00096       _exit(1);
00097     }
00098 
00099   private:
00100     char m_output_file[128];
00101     log4cpp::FileAppender *m_appender;
00102     const char *m_name;
00103     int m_fd;
00104     int m_error;
00105   };
00106 
00107 } // namespace Hypertable
00108 
00109 #endif // HYPERTABLE_TESTHARNESS_H
